variations.template: You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.
rts: You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.

variations.template: You may cast permanent cards from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying their other costs.
rts: You may cast permanent cards from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying their other costs.

variations.template: You may cast instant and sorcery cards from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying their other costs.
rts: You may cast instant and sorcery cards from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying their other costs.
